Name: Hypnolab VR
About the game: Welcome to the Ivory Peaks Corporation! As our latest intern, you have been hired to assist the prestigious Dr. Kady Psyche with her experiments. Suggestion, hypnotism, even outright brain washing- the good doctor is an expert in such things and is more than happy to play the test subject! What happened to the other interns? Don't waste your time asking unnecessary questions, we've got SCIENCE to do! Interact with your environment in first person as you explore her strange laboratory and conduct important scientific mind meltings. Experiment With 7 Hypnotic Toys- gizmos, gadgets, and doodads galore! Discover A Plethora Of Secrets- including hidden locations and hidden objects! Lose Your Mind- there's more than enough to go around, hypnotize yourself too! *Ivory Peaks Corporation takes no responsibility for potential brain damage
